description_for_human: AI-powered chatbot for YouTube live streamers that answers viewer questions using custom knowledge bases.
description_for_model: Looomy is a SaaS product that provides AI-powered chat automation for YouTube live streamers. Content creators can upload their knowledge base (PDFs, text files, transcripts) and Looomy will automatically answer viewer questions in real-time during live streams. The bot is triggered when viewers mention @Looomy in chat.
